abstract: Technology consultant Jesse Chan-Norris is founder of New York chapter of The Awesome Foundation, which gives $1,000 every month to New Yorker with an awe-inspiring idea that needs no-strings financing; chapter has funded 44 projects to date, including renegade tours of the Metropolitan Museum of Art and dye garden grown in the Rockaways by a fashion designer.
lead_paragraph: A foundation’s New York chapter awards a $1,000 grant each month for projects that appeal to its trustees, like new tires for a 1911 car or a tour of an abandoned honeymoon resort.

headline.main: Investing in the Awesome, No Strings Attached

snippet: A foundation’s New York chapter awards a $1,000 grant each month for projects that appeal to its trustees, like new tires for a 1911 car or a tour of an abandoned honeymoon resort.
